summary: "Gilmore Girls" is an American TV show about a close mother-daughter pair, Lorelai and Rory Gilmore. It started in 2000 on The WB network and ran for seven seasons. The show is known for its clever conversations, humor, and drama. It was very popular and is now considered a cult classic. After ending in 2007, it gained new fans when it came to Netflix in 2014. In 2016, the original cast returned for a mini-series revival.
title: Gilmore Girls
